AT.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
AT.description: In einer Welt, in der Spielzeug nicht immer auch für Kinder geeignet ist, schlüpfst du in die Rolle von Van Yamano, einem Jungen, dem ein einzigartiger LBX anvertraut wurde. Und dieser modifizierbare Roboter ist in der Lage, die Welt vor einer Katastrophe zu retten! Aus mehr als 4.000 einzigartigen Teilen kannst du einen eigenen LBX mit individuellen Fähigkeiten und Designmerkmalen bauen, die das Erscheinungsbild und die Leistung deines Roboters beeinflussen. Du kannst mehr als 130 verschiedene Rüstungssets sammeln oder deinen Kampfrobo aus separaten Einzelteilen zusammenstellen!

AU.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
AU.description: In a world where toys are more than just child’s play, you play as Van Yamano, a young boy entrusted with a one-of-a-kind LBX, a tiny customisable robot, which is capable of saving the world from the brink of disaster! Create your own LBX from more than 4,000 unique parts, each with their own abilities and designs that change the look and performance of your custom robot. Complete more than 130 different Armour Sets or mix and match parts to create the ultimate battlin’ bot!

BG.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
BG.description: In a world where toys are more than just child’s play, you play as Van Yamano, a young boy entrusted with a one-of-a-kind LBX, a tiny customisable robot, which is capable of saving the world from the brink of disaster! Create your own LBX from more than 4,000 unique parts, each with their own abilities and designs that change the look and performance of your custom robot. Complete more than 130 different Armour Sets or mix and match parts to create the ultimate battlin’ bot!

BE.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
BE.description: Dans un monde où les jouets ne sont pas que des jeux d'enfant, vous incarnez Van Yamano, un jeune homme accompagné d'un LBX unique, un petit robot personnalisable et capable de sauver le monde ! Assemblez votre propre LBX à partir de plus de 4000 pièces uniques, chacune avec ses propres caractéristiques et conceptions qui modifient l'apparence et les performances de votre robot personnalisé. Complétez plus de 130 sets d'armure différents ou mélangez les pièces pour créer le robot de combat ultime!

movies.name: Little Battlers eXperience : bande-annonce en anglais

NL.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
NL.description: In een wereld waarin speelgoed niet alleen voor kinderen is bedoeld, kruip je in de huid van Van Yamano, een tiener die een unieke LBX toevertrouwd heeft gekregen. Deze minuscule, aanpasbare robot is in staat de wereld te behoeden voor een ramp! Creëer je eigen LBX uit meer dan 4.000 unieke onderdelen, en geef de robot zijn eigen vaardigheden en ontwerp om de uitstraling en prestaties te verbeteren. Verzamel meer dan 130 verschillende pantsersets of combineer onderdelen om de ultieme gevechtsrobot te bouwen!

NZ.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
NZ.description: In a world where toys are more than just child’s play, you play as Van Yamano, a young boy entrusted with a one-of-a-kind LBX, a tiny customisable robot, which is capable of saving the world from the brink of disaster! Create your own LBX from more than 4,000 unique parts, each with their own abilities and designs that change the look and performance of your custom robot. Complete more than 130 different Armour Sets or mix and match parts to create the ultimate battlin’ bot!

PL.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
PL.description: In a world where toys are more than just child’s play, you play as Van Yamano, a young boy entrusted with a one-of-a-kind LBX, a tiny customisable robot, which is capable of saving the world from the brink of disaster! Create your own LBX from more than 4,000 unique parts, each with their own abilities and designs that change the look and performance of your custom robot. Complete more than 130 different Armour Sets or mix and match parts to create the ultimate battlin’ bot!

PT.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
PT.description: Num mundo em que os brinquedos são mais do que mera brincadeira de crianças, Van Yamano é um jovem a quem é confiado um LBX verdadeiramente único. Este pequeno robô é capaz de salvar o mundo do desastre! Cria o teu próprio LBX a partir de mais de 4000 peças únicas, cada uma com as suas próprias habilidades capazes de alterar o aspeto e o desempenho do teu robô individualizado. Conclui mais de 130 Armour Sets ou mistura e combina peças para criares o derradeiro bot de combate!

movies.name: Little Battlers eXperience: Trailer de apresentação
Little Battlers eXperience: Trailer em Inglês

RU.name: Little Battlers eXperience™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В мире, где игрушки — не просто игрушки, вы играете за Вана Ямано — мальчика, в руки которого попал LBX — единственный в своем роде миниатюрный модульный робот, способный спасти мир от гибели. Создайте собственного LBX из более чем 4000 разнообразных деталей, у каждой из которых свои способности и функции. Внешность и производительность вашего робота будут ни на что не похожи. Выиграйте более 130 наборов брони или объединяйте детали из разных наборов, чтобы стать непобедимым!

movies.name: Little Battlers eXperience: трейлер на английском языке
